long_description: The Swix Star XC-100 gloves for women offer great warmth and a sleek fit for comfort and performance on your cross-country skiing adventures. Stretchy Lycra(R) spandex exteriors with rib-knit flex panels allow a wide range of movement. PrimaLoft(R) polyester insulation helps keep your hands toasty on cold winter mornings. Synthetic leather palms and fingers resist abrasion and provide a sure grip of ski poles. Swix Star XC-100 gloves breathe well to prevent overheating.
short_description: The Swix Star XC-100 gloves for women offer great warmth and a sleek fit for comfort and performance on your cross-country skiing adventures.
